1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Generic content class.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Content
6  ( -- * Generic content
7    CContent (..),
8    toDec,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                 as O
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                     as T
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Complex       as D
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Edge          as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Simple        as D
17
18-- | Generic content class.
19class (Show c, B.Default c,
20       D.CEmpty c, D.CEnd c,
21       D.CBool c, D.CCode c, D.CText c, D.CClock c, D.CTime c,
22       D.CTerm c, D.CDec c, D.CType c, D.CInterp c,
23       D.CList c, D.CSet c, D.CTie c, D.CRel c) =>
24    CContent c where
25
26    -- | Order of content type.
27    typeOrder :: c -> Int
28    typeOrder c
29        -- empty
30        | D.isEmpty    c = 1
31
32        -- simple numeric
33        | D.isBool     c = 11
34        | D.isDec      c = 12
35        | D.isClock    c = 13
36        | D.isTime     c = 14
37
38        -- simple textual
39        | D.isCode     c = 15
40        | D.isTerm     c = 16
41        | D.isText     c = 17
42
43        -- complex
44        | D.isList     c = 21
45        | D.isSet      c = 22
46        | D.isTie      c = 23
47        | D.isRel      c = 24
48        | D.isInterp   c = 25
49        | D.isType     c = 27
50
51        -- end
52        | D.isEnd      c = 31
53        | otherwise      = error "unknown content"
54
55-- | Convert some content to decimal number.
56toDec :: (CContent c) => O.Map c
57toDec c
58    | D.isText c  = case T.decodeDecimal $ D.gText c of
59                      Right n  -> D.pDec n
60                      Left _   -> c
61    | D.isBool c  = case D.gBool c of
62                      True   -> D.pInt 1
63                      False  -> D.pInt 0
64    | otherwise   = c
65
